entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
